name: Hunt or Harvest
description:
Hunt or Harvest

Hunt or Harvest is final-project made for my New College of Florida's Cryptography and Data Privacy class in Fall 2020 Semester in a 4 week time span. This Computer Science class taught students about encryption methods, security threats, and ensuring data privacy in applications. This game is an application of learned knowledge, using security practices to make a secure game.

Hunt or Harvest is an easy to learn, easy to play game involving secret messages and decisions, making it perfect to apply security techniques. In Hunt or Harvest, players take the role of farmers deciding to stably "Hunt" with their opponent or "Harvest" their unstable supply of crops individually each season. The player with the most income at the end of the year wins!
